review: If you dont have one get one they are fantastic
author: JoAnn Roberts

review: I am very pleased with the firestick. It is more than I could have hope for
author: Monique

review: Very happy this this. I wish that when searching for titles by name I had the option to limit searches to movies and TV shows that are Prime eligible (free). I also wish there was an option to view movies and TV shows in a list rather than icon format. Lists can be much faster than scrolling icons to find shows.
author: Douglas A Stemen

review: Works very well as I expected it would.  Very handy to have for the modest price.
author: North Man "North Man"

review: The stick worked fine.  The price is great; and was easy to load. ​
author: Amazon Customer

review: So I ended up having to return this, because I have Comcast and they don't allow you to connect to HBOGo through the Fire stick.  Otherwise, though, it worked great.  I feel certain this is on Comcast's end because I LOATHE COMCAST with every fiber of my being, but sadly, had to return this because it couldn't be used fully.
author: Emily Weil

review: Easy to use.  Great content.  Like the photos features.  Quality product for a low price.
author: BonnieC
